blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear text with good edge definition and minimal blur.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text sharpness is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits good black text on white paper contrast that enables clear text recognition.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No contrast adjustment needed for data extraction.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflective spots are visible on the receipt that would impact readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed regarding glare management.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration or staining is evident on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No restoration needed as the document shows no water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows minor curling at the edges but no significant folds or tears that affect text readability.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No specific action needed as the minor curling doesn't impact text extraction.

cut_off_detection.description: The full receipt is captured in the image with all relevant content visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No reshoot needed as all document edges are properly captured.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, subtotal, tax, and total sections all visible.
missing_sections.recommendation: No additional capture needed as all standard receipt sections are present.

obstructions.description: A small portion of what appears to be a finger is visible at the bottom edge but doesn't obscure any relevant receipt information.
obstructions.recommendation: No reshoot needed as the minor obstruction doesn't affect data extraction.
